014package org.microbean.construct.element;
015
016import java.util.ArrayList;
017import java.util.Collection;
018import java.util.List;
019import java.util.Set;
020
021import java.util.function.Supplier;
022
023import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
024import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
025import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
026import javax.lang.model.element.ElementVisitor;
027import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
028import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
029import javax.lang.model.element.ModuleElement;
030import javax.lang.model.element.NestingKind;
031import javax.lang.model.element.PackageElement;
032import javax.lang.model.element.Parameterizable;
033import javax.lang.model.element.QualifiedNameable;
034import javax.lang.model.element.RecordComponentElement;
035import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
036import javax.lang.model.element.TypeParameterElement;
037import javax.lang.model.element.VariableElement;
038
039import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
040
041import org.microbean.construct.UniversalConstruct;
042import org.microbean.construct.PrimordialDomain;
043
044import org.microbean.construct.type.UniversalType;
045
046import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableList;
047
048/**
049 * An {@link Element} and {@link UniversalConstruct} implementation.
050 *
051 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
052 *
053 * @see Element#getKind()
054 *
055 * @see UniversalConstruct
056 */
057@SuppressWarnings("preview") // isUnnamed() usage
058public final class UniversalElement
059  extends UniversalConstruct<Element, UniversalElement>
060  implements ExecutableElement,
061             ModuleElement,
062             PackageElement,
063             RecordComponentElement,
064             TypeElement,
065             TypeParameterElement,
066             VariableElement {
067
068  // volatile not needed
069  private Supplier<? extends List<? extends UniversalElement>> enclosedElementsSupplier;
070
071  /**
072   * Creates a new {@link UniversalElement}.
073   *
074   * @param delegate an {@link Element} to which operations will be delegated; must not be {@code null}
075   *
076   * @param domain a {@link PrimordialDomain} from which the supplied {@code delegate} is presumed to have originated;
077   * must not be {@code null}
078   *
079   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
080   */
081  public UniversalElement(final Element delegate, final PrimordialDomain domain) {
082    this(delegate, null, domain);
083  }
084
085  /**
086   * Creates a new {@link UniversalElement}.
087   *
088   * @param delegate an {@link Element} to which operations will be delegated; must not be {@code null}
089   *
090   * @param annotations a {@link List} of {@link AnnotationMirror} instances representing annotations, often {@linkplain
091   * SyntheticAnnotationMirror synthetic}, that this {@link UniversalElement} should bear; may be {@code null} in which
092   * case only the annotations from the supplied {@code delegate} will be used
093   *
094   * @param domain a {@link PrimordialDomain} from which the supplied {@code delegate} is presumed to have originated;
095   * must not be {@code null}
096   *
097   * @exception NullPointerException if any argument is {@code null}
098   *
099   * @see #delegate()
100   */
101  @SuppressWarnings("try")
102  private UniversalElement(final Element delegate,
103                           final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> annotations,
104                           final PrimordialDomain domain) {
105    super(delegate, annotations, domain);
106    this.enclosedElementsSupplier = () -> {
107      final List<? extends UniversalElement> ees;
108      try (var lock = domain.lock()) {
109        ees = this.wrap(this.delegate().getEnclosedElements());
110        this.enclosedElementsSupplier = () -> ees;
111      }
112      return ees;
113    };
114  }
115
116  @Override // Element
117  public final <R, P> R accept(final ElementVisitor<R, P> v, final P p) {
118    return switch (this.getKind()) {
119    case
120      ANNOTATION_TYPE,
121      CLASS,
122      ENUM,
123      INTERFACE,
124      RECORD                 -> v.visitType(this, p);
125    case TYPE_PARAMETER      -> v.visitTypeParameter(this, p);
126    case
127      BINDING_VARIABLE,
128      ENUM_CONSTANT,
129      EXCEPTION_PARAMETER,
130      FIELD,
131      LOCAL_VARIABLE,
132      PARAMETER,
133      RESOURCE_VARIABLE      -> v.visitVariable(this, p);
134    case RECORD_COMPONENT    -> v.visitRecordComponent(this, p);
135    case
136      CONSTRUCTOR,
137      INSTANCE_INIT,
138      METHOD,
139      STATIC_INIT            -> v.visitExecutable(this, p);
140    case PACKAGE             -> v.visitPackage(this, p);
141    case MODULE              -> v.visitModule(this, p);
142    case OTHER               -> v.visitUnknown(this, p);
143    };
144  }
145
146  @Override // UniversalConstruct<Element, UniversalElement<Element>>
147  protected final UniversalElement annotate(final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> replacementAnnotations) {
148    return new UniversalElement(this.delegate(), replacementAnnotations, this.domain());
149  }
150
151  @Override // Element
152  public final UniversalType asType() {
153    return UniversalType.of(this.delegate().asType(), this.domain());
154  }
155
156  /**
157   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalElement} is a <dfn>generic class declaration</dfn>.
158   *
159   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link UniversalElement} is a <dfn>generic class declaration</dfn>
160   *
161   * @spec https://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se23/html/jls-8.html#jls-8.1.2 Java Language Specification, section
162   * 8.1.2
163   */
164  public final boolean generic() {
165    return switch (this.getKind()) {
166    case CLASS, CONSTRUCTOR, ENUM, INTERFACE, METHOD, RECORD -> !this.getTypeParameters().isEmpty();
167    default -> false;
168    };
169  }
170
171  @Override // RecordComponentElement
172  public final UniversalElement getAccessor() {
173    return switch (this.getKind()) {
174    case RECORD_COMPONENT -> this.wrap(((RecordComponentElement)this.delegate()).getAccessor());
175    default -> null;
176    };
177  }
178
179  @Override // TypeParameterElement
180  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getBounds() {
181    return switch (this.getKind()) {
182    case TYPE_PARAMETER -> UniversalType.of(((TypeParameterElement)this.delegate()).getBounds(), this.domain());
183    default -> List.of();
184    };
185  }
186
187  @Override // VariableElement
188  @SuppressWarnings("try")
189  public final Object getConstantValue() {
190    return switch (this.getKind()) {
191    case BINDING_VARIABLE, ENUM_CONSTANT, EXCEPTION_PARAMETER, FIELD, LOCAL_VARIABLE, PARAMETER, RESOURCE_VARIABLE -> {
192      try (var lock = this.domain().lock()) {
193        // There is a LOT going on here; take the domain lock for safety. See
194        // https://github.com/openjdk/jdk/blob/jdk-25%2B3/src/jdk.compiler/share/classes/com/sun/tools/javac/code/Symbol.java#L1813-L1829
195        yield
196          ((VariableElement)this.delegate()).getConstantValue(); // will be a boxed type or String
197      }
198    }
199    default -> null;
200    };
201  }
202
203  @Override // ExecutableElement
204  public final UniversalAnnotationValue getDefaultValue() {
205    return switch (this.getKind()) {
206      // See
207      // https://github.com/openjdk/jdk/blob/jdk-25%2B3/src/jdk.compiler/share/classes/com/sun/tools/javac/code/Symbol.java#L2287-L2290;
208      // no concurrent Name access so no lock needed
209    case METHOD -> UniversalAnnotationValue.of(((ExecutableElement)this.delegate()).getDefaultValue(), this.domain());
210    default -> null;
211    };
212  }
213
214  @Override // ModuleElement
215  public final List<? extends UniversalDirective> getDirectives() {
216    return switch (this.getKind()) {
217    case MODULE -> UniversalDirective.of(((ModuleElement)this.delegate()).getDirectives(), this.domain());
218    default -> List.of();
219    };
220  }
221
222  /*
223    java.lang.AssertionError: Filling jrt:/java.base/java/lang/String$CaseInsensitiveComparator.class during DirectoryFileObject[/modules/java.base:java/lang/Integer$IntegerCache.class]
224    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.util.Assert.error(Assert.java:162)
225    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.ClassFinder.fillIn(ClassFinder.java:366)
226    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.ClassFinder.complete(ClassFinder.java:302)
227    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.complete(Symbol.java:687)
228    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$ClassSymbol.complete(Symbol.java:1455)
229    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol.apiComplete(Symbol.java:693)
230    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$TypeSymbol.getEnclosedElements(Symbol.java:864)
231    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$ClassSymbol.getEnclosedElements(Symbol.java:1420)
232    at jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$ClassSymbol.getEnclosedElements(Symbol.java:1264)
233    at org.microbean.construct@0.0.10-SNAPSHOT/org.microbean.construct.element.UniversalElement.getEnclosedElements(UniversalElement.java:195)
234  */
235  // See https://github.com/microbean/microbean-construct/issues/18
236  @Override // Element
237  public final List<? extends UniversalElement> getEnclosedElements() {
238    return this.enclosedElementsSupplier.get();
239  }
240
241  @Override // Element
242  public final UniversalElement getEnclosingElement() {
243    return this.wrap(this.delegate().getEnclosingElement());
244  }
245
246  @Override // TypeParameterElement
247  public final UniversalElement getGenericElement() {
248    return switch (this.getKind()) {
249    case TYPE_PARAMETER -> this.wrap(((TypeParameterElement)this.delegate()).getGenericElement());
250    default -> this.getEnclosingElement(); // illegal state
251    };
252  }
253
254  @Override // TypeElement
255  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getInterfaces() {
256    return switch (this.getKind()) {
257    case ANNOTATION_TYPE, CLASS, ENUM, INTERFACE, RECORD ->
258      UniversalType.of(((TypeElement)this.delegate()).getInterfaces(), this.domain());
259    default -> List.of();
260    };
261  }
262
263  @Override // Element
264  public final ElementKind getKind() {
265    return this.delegate().getKind();
266  }
267
268  @Override // Element
269  public final Set<Modifier> getModifiers() {
270    return this.delegate().getModifiers();
271  }
272
273  @Override // TypeElement
274  public final NestingKind getNestingKind() {
275    return switch (this.getKind()) {
276    case ANNOTATION_TYPE, CLASS, ENUM, INTERFACE, RECORD -> ((TypeElement)this.delegate()).getNestingKind();
277    default -> NestingKind.TOP_LEVEL; // illegal state
278    };
279  }
280
281  @Override // ExecutableElement
282  public final List<? extends UniversalElement> getParameters() {
283    return switch (this.getKind()) {
284    case CONSTRUCTOR, METHOD -> this.wrap(((ExecutableElement)this.delegate()).getParameters());
285    default -> List.of();
286    };
287  }
288
289  @Override // ModuleElement, PackageElement, TypeElement
290  @SuppressWarnings("try")
291  public final StringName getQualifiedName() {
292    return switch (this.getKind()) {
293    case ANNOTATION_TYPE, CLASS, ENUM, INTERFACE, MODULE, PACKAGE, RECORD -> {
294      try (var lock = this.domain().lock()) {
295        yield StringName.of(((QualifiedNameable)this.delegate()).getQualifiedName().toString(), this.domain());
296      }
297    }
298    default -> StringName.of("", this.domain());
299    };
300  }
301
302  @Override // ExecutableElement
303  public final UniversalType getReceiverType() {
304    return
305      this.getKind().isExecutable() ?
306      UniversalType.of(this.asType(), this.domain()).getReceiverType() :
307      UniversalType.of(this.domain().noType(TypeKind.NONE), this.domain());
308  }
309
310  @Override // TypeElement
311  public final List<? extends UniversalElement> getRecordComponents() {
312    return switch (this.getKind()) {
313    case RECORD -> this.wrap(((TypeElement)this.delegate()).getRecordComponents());
314    default -> List.of();
315    };
316  }
317
318  @Override // ExecutableElement
319  public final UniversalType getReturnType() {
320    return UniversalType.of(this.asType(), this.domain()).getReturnType();
321  }
322
323  @Override // Element
324  @SuppressWarnings("try")
325  public final StringName getSimpleName() {
326    try (var lock = this.domain().lock()) {
327      return new StringName(this.delegate().getSimpleName().toString(), this.domain());
328    }
329  }
330
331  @Override // TypeElement
332  public final UniversalType getSuperclass() {
333    return switch (this.getKind()) {
334    case ANNOTATION_TYPE, CLASS, ENUM, INTERFACE, RECORD ->
335      UniversalType.of(((TypeElement)this.delegate()).getSuperclass(), this.domain());
336    default -> UniversalType.of(this.domain().noType(TypeKind.NONE), this.domain());
337    };
338  }
339
340  @Override // ExecutableElement
341  public final List<? extends UniversalType> getThrownTypes() {
342    return
343      this.getKind().isExecutable() ?
344      UniversalType.of(((ExecutableElement)this.delegate()).getThrownTypes(), this.domain()) :
345      List.of();
346  }
347
348  @Override // ExecutableElement
349  public final List<? extends UniversalElement> getTypeParameters() {
350    return switch (this.getKind()) {
351    case CLASS, CONSTRUCTOR, ENUM, INTERFACE, RECORD, METHOD ->
352      this.wrap(((Parameterizable)this.delegate()).getTypeParameters());
353    default -> List.of();
354    };
355  }
356
357  @Override // ExecutableElement
358  public final boolean isDefault() {
359    return switch (this.getKind()) {
360    case METHOD -> ((ExecutableElement)this.delegate()).isDefault();
361    default -> false;
362    };
363  }
364
365  @Override // ModuleElement
366  public final boolean isOpen() {
367    return switch (this.getKind()) {
368    case MODULE -> ((ModuleElement)this.delegate()).isOpen();
369    default -> false;
370    };
371  }
372
373  @Override // ModuleElement, PackageElement
374  public final boolean isUnnamed() {
375    return switch (this.getKind()) {
376    case MODULE  -> ((ModuleElement)this.delegate()).isUnnamed();
377    case PACKAGE -> ((PackageElement)this.delegate()).isUnnamed();
378    default -> false;
379    };
380  }
381
382  @Override // ExecutableElement
383  public final boolean isVarArgs() {
384    return switch (this.getKind()) {
385    case CONSTRUCTOR, METHOD -> ((ExecutableElement)this.delegate()).isVarArgs();
386    default -> false;
387    };
388  }
389
390  /**
391   * A convenience method that returns {@code true} if this {@link UniversalElement} represents the class declaration
392   * for {@code java.lang.Object}.
393   *
394   * @return {@code true} if this {@link UniversalElement} is the class declaration for {@code java.lang.Object}
395   */
396  public final boolean javaLangObject() {
397    return switch (this.getKind()) {
398    case CLASS -> this.getQualifiedName().contentEquals("java.lang.Object");
399    default -> false;
400    };
401  }
402
403  private final UniversalElement wrap(final Element e) {
404    return of(e, this.domain());
405  }
406
407  private final List<? extends UniversalElement> wrap(final Collection<? extends Element> es) {
408    return of(es, this.domain());
409  }
410
411
412  /*
413   * Static methods.
414   */
415
416
417  /**
418   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalElement}s whose elements wrap the supplied
419   * {@link List}'s elements.
420   *
421   * @param es a {@link Collection} of {@link Element}s; must not be {@code null}
422   *
423   * @param domain a {@link PrimordialDomain}; must not be {@code null}
424   *
425   * @return a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link List} of {@link UniversalElement}s
426   *
427   * @exception NullPointerException if either argument is {@code null}
428   */
429  public static final List<? extends UniversalElement> of(final Collection<? extends Element> es, final PrimordialDomain domain) {
430    if (es.isEmpty()) {
431      return List.of();
432    }
433    final List<UniversalElement> newEs = new ArrayList<>(es.size());
434    for (final Element e : es) {
435      newEs.add(of(e, domain));
436    }
437    return unmodifiableList(newEs);
438  }
439
440  /**
441   * Returns a {@link UniversalElement} that is either the supplied {@link Element} (if it itself is {@code null} or is
442   * a {@link UniversalElement}) or one that wraps it.
443   *
444   * @param e an {@link Element}; may be {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
445   *
446   * @param domain a {@link PrimordialDomain}; must not be {@code null}
447   *
448   * @return a {@link UniversalElement}, or {@code null} (if {@code e} is {@code null})
449   *
450   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code domain} is {@code null}
451   *
452   * @see #UniversalElement(Element, PrimordialDomain)
453   */
454  public static final UniversalElement of(final Element e, final PrimordialDomain domain) {
455    return switch (e) {
456    case null -> null;
457    case UniversalElement ue -> ue;
458    default -> new UniversalElement(e, domain);
459    };
460  }
461
462}
